title: New: Boots – Alright / Ride Ride Ride
body:
As much as other websites might have you believe with the tone of their coverage, **Boots** is no longer just ‘that Beyonce collaborator’.

With a Soundcloud steadily filling up with straight up jams, dropping not one but two new tracks today. From a vaguely Beastie Boys sounding _Alright_ that finds Boots rapping for the first time, to the Frank Ocean-esque _Ride Ride Ride_, Boots is rapidly making a name for himself as not just a producer and songwriter for others, but as a star in his own right. Check out both below.
